answer: O foco do componente de extensão se concentra em articular teoria e prática com arranjos produtivos e outros setores da sociedade civil, e em práticas de extensão de disseminação científica e tecnológica.

It also mentions that the extension component carries out activities and actions that promote scientific and technological literacy. Therefore, the question is clearly and unambiguously answerable with the context.
relevance_eval: This question is useful for understanding the role and purpose of the extension component in software development. It is relevant to the automation course at UFSC Blumenau, as students may be expected to use or develop extension components as part of their coursework or projects.
